title: Sanginita Chemi Standalone December 2025 Net Sales at Rs 43.47 crore, down 29.35% Y-o-Y
author: Broker Research
content:
Reported Standalone quarterly numbers for Sanginita Chemicals are:Net Sales at Rs 43.47 crore in December 2025 down 29.35% from Rs. 61.54 crore in December 2024. Quarterly Net Loss at Rs. 2.78 crore in December 2025 down 2076.14% from Rs. 0.14 crore in December 2024. EBITDA stands negative at Rs. 1.76 crore in December 2025 down 240.8% from Rs. 1.25 crore in December 2024. Sanginita Chemi shares closed at 11.20 on January 12, 2026 (NSE) and has given 7.69% returns over the last 6 months and -22.44% over the last 12 months.
